descs.title: Achievements:
points: Built a MongoDB extraction system (and integration testing) which converted collections of user tickets into CSV files, allowing for easier analysis by the team.
Moved the survey from external link to in-app. While doing so, improved the survey popup by adjusting to user statistics from google analytics.
Added a notification banner to website for service outages; operates using google buckets which removes the need to redeploy the website.
